phrases: Where are the other reconnaissance members?
I told you I cannot describe it.
We cannot confirm your vitals or coordinates.
I am headed towards the Fukagawa entrance point,
We are coming to rescue you.
This is not a place man should tread.
Oh, how commendable of you, taking out the garbage in the morning.
If only everyone else followed the rules like you, Li-san.
I have seen this black one around here lately.
It is probably the same one that is been rummaging through the garbage at night.
It seems like someone is been feeding him.
No, I am going to my part-time job.
It better not be a sleazy job.
Speaking of which, do not they eat anything with four legs in your country, besides tables?
I have not tried it myself, but...
Can you deliver this to the annex?
You know, to Consultant Tahara's place in front of the office.
Is not a consultant a high-ranking position?
It looks like he is been sleeping there and not going home.
I have no idea what he is working on.
They say he was once an important scientist.
Before he came here, he was apparently conducting strange research abroad.
Heard about the Hell's Gate First Reconnaissance Troop?
Rumor has it that he was the sole survivor of the incident.
They say he lost his soul in that gate.
Well, I do not know whether it is true or not.
Consultant, there is a package for you.
Um, the factory manager asked me to hand you this.
Are not you being paid by the hour?
Get back to work if you are finished.
In order to avoid bankruptcy, you need that man's power, right?
Let us hurry and obtain it if that is the case.
Is not that why I am here with you?
There are necessary procedures one must follow in order to conduct business.
Those procedures are a pain in the ass.
Honestly speaking, I hate you contractors.
Do you know why we are breathing the same air, even though it stinks of your bad breath?
Reluctantly, all for the sake of business.
Furthermore, do you know why you are acting indifferently, despite what I just said?
It is because you are a piece of garbage that cannot manage to live without the protection of your patron.
If you understand where I am going with this, do not ever second-guess me.
I better work hard so you do not throw me away.
If he declines, we will move on to the next step.
We will keep going until he says yes.
If he still will not concede, we will persuade him by force.
That is how I handle things.
Hey, what are you doing in a place like this?
There is a call for you from the headmaster of Nishi Toyotama Middle School.
Do you have a Japanese driver's license?
I am asking if you can drive a car!
A New Star Shines in the Dawn Sky... (Part One)
Two employees from Meyer Hilton checked into a hotel at Shinjuku thirty minutes ago.
How are things on your side?
Well, you were under the custody of your mother,
but ever since your mother passed away, you have been living with your father, correct?
In that case, your legal guardian is...
I do not consider a person who only comes home once a month as my legal guardian.
My, we are lucky the notice came to the school and not to the police, but...
I am telling you that I did not commit arson!
However, the person who witnessed it said you were burning trash at the back of the building.
I was not the one who burned it!
It was burning right in front of me before I realized it.
Why do not you believe me?
Mr. Tahara, I still have more to say...
Was the trash burning on its own before you realized it?
When did you start acting unconsciously?
for you to be talking to me.
Hurry up and return to the factory.
You have recently been acting as if your mind has been drifting, Mai.
I think my soul has been drifting on occasion.
Tired from doing too many chores?
You do not have a mother, do you, Mai?
But you have a father, right?
Are you doing the cooking, Mai?
I am also eating by myself.
Your dad does not come home?
Why do not you eat dinner at my place from now on?
I have a brother and sister, so it is kind of noisy, but...
Meals taste better when there are people around.
Papa and Mama will be glad to have you, so come over!
We will not have any food left if you come.
I guess I will have to decline.
My father might come back today for once.
A lot of things happened, so I will probably be lectured.
How many times do I have to tell you before you understand?
I have been saying that I will not return to your company.
In that case, we will be forced to change our attitude.
We are proceeding to the next step.
I would like to pay for both of these items.
So what are you doing at this time of night?
That is none of your business.
Did that person tell you to keep an eye on me?
I do not want to see your face!
Do not ever come back again!
I do not want to go home.
I do not want to go back to that dark and empty room.
Then let us play until morning.
Can you close your eyes for a second?
The capricious patissier's parfait with fresh fruit and choux chocolat, topped with rice dumplings and almond seeds!
So you are from China, Li-san.
It may not look like it, but I have been living abroad.
My family lived in Africa until I entered grade school...
I will show it only to you, Li-san.
The glow was stronger in the past.
It gradually became darker, and now it even disappears from time to time.
When I was a child, Papa told me there was an amulet inside that was protecting me.
What kind of research did he do?
Li-san, why did you come to Japan?
Do you have any brothers, sisters, or family?
You are the same as me.
It is almost time for the first train.
but it is not the one.
Li-san, you are kind of like an... older brother.
We are going into the next alley.
Hey, you cannot come in here!
Boss, it is a new star!
Moratorium, those who have deferred the conditions of their contract.
Power that does not come with an immediate price requires a larger compensation.
The withering affection is a one-way ticket with no return.
Its destination, either heaven or hell.
Her scream will become a new flare, and her fate will be sealed.
Everything will be engulfed by the roaring flames.
Episode Four A New Star Shines in the Dawn Sky... (Part Two)
